AND YOUR BABY: SUPPORTING LOVE AND NURTURE ON THE NEONATAL UNIT
© Unicef UK/Mead
The
Baby Friendly 
Initiative
For all babies
Supporting love and nurture  
on the neonatal unit
You and your baby 
127
Helpful tips
Breastfeeding should 
feel comfortable. Your 
baby should be relaxed. 
You should hear a soft 
swallowing. If it doesn’t feel 
right, start again. Slide one 
of	your	fingers	into	your	
baby’s mouth, gently break 
the suction and try again.
10
128
